thread.title: Bethany L
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Bethany L

author: Bethany L
title: Bethany L
text: We were a bit nervous going in, but the employees are very friendly, they listen to your needs and help you find what you need. Everything is very affordably priced and you get same day shipping! Overall love this place, will be shopping here for all my furniture in the future
